articles.author: Tebogo Monama
articles.title: SA records zero Covid-19 deaths in 24-cycle for the first time since May 2020 - News24
articles.description: For the first time since May 2020, South Africa has recorded zero Covid-19-related deaths in a 24-hour cycle.
articles.content:
• For the first time since May 2020, South Africa has recorded zero Covid-19-related deaths in a 24-hour cycle.
  • 183 deaths were recorded in the last 48 hours as part of an audit.
